thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: RBS: Investors Scorned Have Reason to Look Again

author: Paul J. Davies
title: RBS: Investors Scorned Have Reason to Look Again
text:
The tattered ghosts of failed buy calls on Royal Bank of Scotland haunt the past few years.
The U.K. bank that took the countryâ€™s biggest bailout during the financial crisis has stumbled time and again during its long restructuring. Heard on the Street capitulated on hopes of dividends resuming in August 2016.
So surely it would be madness...
